website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung DualView TL205's front LCD and low price make it a decent choice for self-portrait-loving photographers on a budget.
pros: The Samsung DualView TL205 has a second LCD up front and an angled bottom to make self-portraits a snap
cons: The Samsung DualView TL205 feels cheaply made and produces mediocre low-light photos

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Dual View Camera A+!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item looking for a camera to take self shots at the bar and going out. I found this Samsung Dual View camera and it was a great investment. Its convenient, sleek, and the Dual screen in the front is not noticeable until the camera is put into that setting. A+
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes wonderful photos. Easily captures children. Has tons of different settings. Takes professional quality photos. Would highly recommend! Lightweight and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Mr &Ms.H

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: It takes fuzzy pictures sometimes but I found out how to fix that with the camera. It's really worth the price and I have had this camera for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: ChristiMBA

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for the front screen
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this camera for the front screen, ideal for her auto photos. The cons (personal opinion) is the quality of the images. I have a Sony and the quality of the images it is much better.
customer_reviews.author: William Delgado V.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera~
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. I bought this for my trip to Puerta Vallarta and this little camera did not fail! Takes great pictures and is easy to use. This item came promptly in time for my trip with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Used digcam that works as new
customer_reviews.text: Used digcam that works as new. I've used it right away during our trip with my friends. Pictures are clear and crisp. So easy to operate. User friendly menu that are intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Lovehappy1969

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't focus in video
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that there's a small screen in the front, but right after the picture's taken, the camera must stay there for a second in order for the camera to process it and the picture not be blurry. It wouldn't be so much a problem if I had steady hands. Also, in video, when you put text close up, it won't focus, which I'm sad about b/c I like to film videos that involve reading small text from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It was sent to me in good shape just wish it had a directions for optimal use manual. I am very happy with the price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: jonesy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This was a great camera for the price. Easy to use...the only downside is that the refurbished camera does not come with a complete user manual; however, you can download a PDF user manual online.
customer_reviews.author: Longanecker

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than one month!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a birthday gift for my mom and the flash broke in just a few weeks. Now I get to fight with the Samsung company customer service about the warranty. Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: MY SON LOVED IT. PERFECT GIFT FOR CHRISTMAS, YOU CAN TAKE A PICTURE OF YOURSELF AND SEE WHAT YOUR SNAPPING FAST SHIPPING
customer_reviews.author: cin1234

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been very reliable, haven't had any issues. Being a Samsung, you always get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: chrometoyota

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: great camera, it takes very good photos, nice colors, good sized images, nice touch to have a front LCD display
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Grader Loves This Phone
customer_reviews.text: Front facing LCD is perfect for selfies plus the camera is easy to use and even does videos. Got it used for less than $50 and was the perfect birthday gift for an 8 yr-old.
customer_reviews.author: K. F. Judd

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to use camera with a great front display for taking self pics. I love the menu wheel, which makes it easy to change picture modes.
customer_reviews.author: christopher h.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what to expect when ordering this camera, but I was pleased when it arrived. This camera was exactly as stated in the description. It is a very good camera and easy to use. It is light weight and take great pictures. This is a great camera for anyone to have. I definitly recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: jennysue75

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: takes great pictures and the child feature on the front is great makes and kid smile and laugh. Is a must buy and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my honeymoon! I love the front screen especially since we did not have people to take pictures for us! It was great and all of over pictures have turned out wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a gift for my mom and she loved it, she really wanted a touch screen camera but she ended up loving this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary G.

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I can say that this camera it's very nice because the images are very clear and it's easy to use, the front display is really nice, you can take your pictures yourself and like you want.
customer_reviews.author: Sewin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this camera. it is easy to use, produces great pictures. files are quite large though. i'll keep it!
customer_reviews.author: David Norred

customer_reviews.title: A very nice Compact Camera.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to up grade to a new but not pocket- breaking camera. portable, easy to use & very good pictures. I like that it has a dual screen as my wife likes to take many pictures of her & the kids together. It's not the best Camera out there but for my simple needs, it does quite well .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Not sleek, real basic for the way it's advertised. The camera's LCD gets black blotches on it, and i never dropped it. Waste of money, go with more expensive to get a camera that lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Miss MJ

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but not the worst either
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes good pictures, and the front screen is fun, but there's already 2 black lines across the back screen..... I don't think it should damage that easily... It doesn't affect the outcome of the photo any though. It's just a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!  Great price, great vendor.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it refurbished, works perfectly. USPS seems to have "lost" our first order but vendor shipped new one overnight with no problem. I was very satisfied and would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Missing Something
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool camera! The only thing I wish is that it took black & white picture or different effects. I just like to carry a camera in my purse, it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rene'

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: buy this camera even my father's birthday is very good, I have not had any problems with it, take great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: omfg
customer_reviews.text: when i got this thing it worked just fine recorded mediocre videos whatever, then i got ready to use it one day and it had a big ass black line goin across the back screen and its been there every since, still takes decent photos but if you can find another camera, get another one
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Dual View 12.2MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes awesome photos for a point and shoot. If you wait for a sale you can get it for under $130! Great colors, sharp images.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hersee

customer_reviews.title: Love This Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: Takes very good pictures, quick charge and battery lasts a long time!! Have recommended to friends and will continue to :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Seneca

customer_reviews.title: samsung dual view
customer_reviews.text: bought the samsung dual view for my daughters birthday and shes love it! took very good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Yusri B. Muhamad

customer_reviews.title: Worst 12MP camera!! Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: POS: Cheap!! Dual view was good but it works for my kid only for first few times. CON: It's like a cheap plastic toy. Poor picture quality. 12MP is a joke because my old Casio 5MP camera is better than this. DON'T BUY THIS CAMERA!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chow Lin

customer_reviews.title: The Best Camera I've Bought Yet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought is camera for my graduation & I had my sister taking the pictures. She fell in love with my camera. She like my camera better than her own.
customer_reviews.author: Triana

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Dualview
customer_reviews.text: I really have no idea how this product works because the seller sent the wrong battery pack & charger.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 1 year....  Good while I had it....
customer_reviews.text: HATE that it didn't last longer than I expected. I like this camera b/c it's user friendly and small. Hate it for some blurry and sometimes reddish pictures (I'd like to think it's on my part not the camera's---- definitely not like SLR cameras). I used it daily and really loved the dual LCD Screens. It is not an important factor, but really nice & fun addition. Not a big fan of a 3x optical zoom, would prefer a bigger number. The price is not bad. I even used the 1 year warranty repair. Samsung representatives were great. Got mine for $99.99. I would consider a better camera. Battery life is okay. ... It was fun while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Jona

customer_reviews.title: Buttons hard to read
customer_reviews.text: I needed a camera quickly and bought this camera today for a function this weekend. It is going back to the store tomorrow. The problem is the case of the camera is black plastic and the functions buttons on the back are black on black, making them almost impossible to read. Why they put black on black is beyond comprehension. This camera is going back as I need to be able to see what the buttons are for without a flashlight. Now that I'm reading other reviews the picture quality seems to be lacking in this camera also.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera and have been wanting it since it was first released. I finally purchased it and I'm returning it because it's way too slow. It takes really nice pictures and the screen on the front is really a fantastic feature if you're someone that likes to take self portraits without needing a place to place the camera and use a timer. That's something I do all the time with my husband. I'm returning it because it takes a long time for the flash to fire and then recharge. We have a 5 month old so we need a faster camera to capture all her precious little smiles that happen so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Photo quality is hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: Of course it is easy to use but I am sad to say the photo quality is hit or miss. I was hoping for a small camera to travel with but I am not sure this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Corrie DiStefano

customer_reviews.title: Can't get a decent photo on this camera
customer_reviews.text: i have been a photographer for over 20 years and mostly use DSLRs. i wanted another point & shoot camera and loved the idea of a front LCD screen. but i just cannot get a good photo on this camera. i am using the fastest media card and still my photos are blurry. i think i'll go back to kodak or nikon for a cheap point & shoot. this one just didn't do it.
customer_reviews.author: clevegirl1

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Had the camera for less than a year and it just quit. Sent it in to Samsung under warranty and they tell me that it was "Water Damage" and is not "fully" covered under their warranty. I am waiting to see what they offer me for replacement and at what cost. I did not think that using the camera outdoors would be so harsh on it. (I live in Oregon and it does rain here frequently.)The camera was fun while it lasted but my last Sony lasted 6 years and it was still working when I got this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Milne

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this camera
customer_reviews.text: I had heard good things about the Samsung cameras, but couldnt find any online reviews for the TL205 since this was a new product. However, I took a gamble and bought this camera. This is probably the worst purchase of my life. Auto focus is horrible, and taking pictures in low light is not even worth it. I really wish I had taken this back before the return period expired. The interface / menu is nice. And the smile detection actually works pretty well, but it doesnt out-weigh the fact that this takes horrible quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Damaged screen with black spots
customer_reviews.text: Damaged screen with black spots, they sent me a camera used new request and pay for new. The sharp images Samsung DualView TL205 - Digital camera - compact - 12.2 Mpix - optical zoom: 3 x - supported memory: SD, SDHC - silver
customer_reviews.author: Iván Villagómez

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I was a little unsure whether I would like it because of the zoom but it is not nearly as bulky as it looks in the picture. I wish there was more internal memory. There is only enough for one picture.
customer_reviews.author: farvalu

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Not terribly expensive and got my moneys worth. Front facing screen is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jaded~Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: samsung dual view camera
customer_reviews.text: Great compact camera. Has smile and blink detection, great HD images. i've always had Kodak cameras and this beats it by a mile. had this camera about a month, LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bargaingrl

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest waste of money I have ever spent!!!! I stored the camera in a hard protective pouch, NEVER dropped it, took great care of it & the 2nd time I used it lines started appearing through the screen. We have made numerous phone calls & emails over the course of 3 months & cannot get Samsung to help us get the camera fixed. They haven't even bothered to contact us back at all. This is the worst customer service ever. PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Creech

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value buy
customer_reviews.text: A great piece for someone who doesn't indulge in heavy duty photography. I use it to take casual pictures and likw the fact that it is compact, easy to use and has decent picture quality. Thats all I need and it comes at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Ammar

product_meta.title: Samsung TL205 12 Megapixel Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom, Dual LCD Screens, Smart Auto, Digital Image Stabilization, Silver
product_meta.description:
The TL205 has everything you need in one compact camera. 12.2 megapixels give you the power to capture memories with beautiful details. And with a 3x optical zoom, its easy to get close to your subjects. Worried that photos might be less than perfect? The TL205 includes the Smart Auto feature which can recognize and automatically adjust to ensure the best shot possible.

Dual LCD Screens
Turn every scene into a photo op - starring you! The 1.5" Front LCD Screen lets you get out from behind the camera and get in the shot. You can perfectly frame yourself in the 

3x Optical Zoom
With a 3x optical zoom, you'll get up close and personal with every subject. Plus, a slim, stylish design makes the mounted inner zoom lens easier to use and carry. A special coating on both sides of the lenses prevents false color and distortion while delivering outstanding picture quality.

Digital Image Stabilization
Get brighter and more natural pictures with DIS technology. With DIS the effects of image blur are reduced in lower light conditions. You can even take well exposed, sharper pictures without using a flash.

Smart Auto 2.0
Take the best photos possible, with the Smart Auto feature. It automatically selects one of several scene modes which best suits the environment youre shooting in. For example, it automatically sets the camera to landscape scene mode if youre taking an image of a mountain range, and then switches gears and automatically selects the portrait scene mode if you proceed to take an image of an individual.

2.7 LCD Screen
Its easy to take pictures with the large 2.7" LCD screen. And with improved contrast and color reproduction youll be able to take and edit your photos effortlessly.

12.2 MP
High resolution images, outstanding quality. The Samsung TL205 delivers nothing short of brilliant images with a tr
feature_bullets: 3 X Optical Zoom / 4 X Digital / 12 X Total

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
